actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Resolution directing the Attorney General of the United States to furnish to the House of Representatives certain information and documents respecting communications made by Kim Sang Keun of the Republic of South Korea to officials of the Department of Justice relating to Members and employees of Congress.

summary.text: Directs the Attorney General to furnish the House of Representatives all communications and documents received by the Department of Justice from Kim Sang Keun of South Korea respecting Members and employees of Congress.

titles.title: Resolution directing the Attorney General of the United States to furnish to the House of Representatives certain information and documents respecting communications made by Kim Sang Keun of the Republic of South Korea to officials of the Department of Justice relating to Members and employees of Congress.
